# CNErrorUserInfoAffectedRecordsKey

**Global Variable**

The contact, group, and container objects for which the error code applies.

## Declaration

```swift
let CNErrorUserInfoAffectedRecordsKey: String
```

## Discussion

An array of one or more [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/CNContact], [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/CNGroup], or [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/CNContainer] objects for which the error code applies.

## Error data keys

- **CNErrorUserInfoAffectedRecordIdentifiersKey**: String objects for which the error code applies.
- **CNErrorUserInfoValidationErrorsKey**: An array of validation-related error objects.
- **CNErrorUserInfoKeyPathsKey**: An array of key paths associated with a given error.
